attributes.action: consider making forces pensions both past and present free from income tax
attributes.additional_details:
We feel that members of the Armed Forces put their lives on the line for this country and rightfully earn a military pension.
Throughout their service they pay income tax on their monthly wage. Once they leave the services and gain employment in civvy street their military pension is classed as a second income and therefore their monthly salary is taxed at a higher rate whilst their pension is taxed at base rate.
So after a full service to Queen and country they are then penalised for the remainder of their working career.
I would like to petition that Forces Pensions are made free from income income tax.
